subject: From the Desk  of  President
body:
From the Desk  of  President
Federal Republic of Nigeria
His Excellency Bola Ahmed Tinubu.GCFR
This is to officially inform you that i have written to you before
without getting respond from you and i believe that my previous mail
did not get to you therefore i write to you again. I am contacting you
concerning the release of your inheritance fund / Draft /Cheque /ATM
Card which have been delayed for transfer by some officials who claim
to be in position of your fund thereby extorting money from you in one
way or the other.
Your Fund has finally been approved for transfer by me after my
vetting and verification, Your fund will be transfer to you via
MasterCard ATM which is cash able in any ATM machine or Bank anywhere
in the world.
You are hereby inform you that the ATM card worth US$6,300,000 has
been credited in your favour as the first part payment of your
inheritance fund which has been delayed by these officers who claim to
be in position of your fund.
Therefore you are warned to stop any further communication with
anybody concerning your inheritance fund. Your fund to be released via
MasterCard ATM in act to uphold the rule of law which we represent.You
have to reconfirm the information’s below for security reasons. The
only money you are obliged to pay is $150 dollars which is the cost of
the Delivery.
You are advised to rush to western union or money gram outlet nearby
you and send the money using the following payment direction as
carefully stipulated for your own use below :
RECEIVERS NAMES :  DURU GOODLUCK IBUCHUKWU .
RECEIVERS ADDRESS : NIGERIA
AMOUNT: 150USD ONLY.
SENDERS NAME...........
SENDERS ADDRESS .........
Send them the following information’s of yours for the conclusion of
your ATM Card:
Full Name:____ Delivery Address:__ Country:___
Occupation:__Phone Number:_ Age:__ sex:__
Regards,
Mr. John Abu.

subject: Re:   From the Desk  of  President
body:
Hello Mr. John Abu,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, your message is quite intriguing! It's not every day that one receives a message from the desk of the President of the Federal Republic of Nigeria.

I'm curious about this ATM card you mentioned. How does it work exactly? And why was my fund delayed in the first place?

Also, could you please clarify what you mean by "the only money you are obliged to pay is dollars"? How many dollars are we talking about here?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Sylvia
